nodes.text: Gamden was a male Human who worked in the employ of the Sith Empire during the Cold War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Gamden appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Hutta Commendations Vendor on Carrick Station, though he was later relabeled as a Level 8 Equipment Vendor. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
